alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:39PM EDT until August 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Newberry County in central South Carolina... North central Saluda County in central South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 539 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gray Court to 6 miles northwest of Waterloo to near Shoals Junction, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Newberry, Whitmire, Prosperity, Newberry County Airport, Blair, Newberry College, Blackstock, Pomaria, Silverstreet, Newberry County Detention Center, US-176 and SC- 34 Crossroads, Henderson Island, Belfast Wildlife Management Area, Chappells, Chappells Fire Station, Maybington Fire Station, Scurry Airport, Feasterville Fire Station, Bush River Fire Station, and Hickory Grove. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 62 and 82. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
